Class Settlement

  • java.lang.Object
    • Settlement

  • public class Settlement
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a road that is linked to two settlements: source and destination.
    Version:
    1.0 (15th March 2016)
    Author:
    Artur Malinowski

      • findRoads

        public java.util.ArrayList<Road> findRoads(java.lang.String name)
        Returns a ArrayList of Roads that match the given name
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the road to find
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of Road objects (will be a maximum of two items for any settlements: e.g. A487 goes from Aber to Penparcau and from Aber to Bow Street

      • deleteRoads

        public void deleteRoads()
        Deletes all the roads attached to this settlement. It will also detach these roads from the settlements at the other end of each road

      • delete

        public void delete(Road road)
            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Parameters:
        road -
        Throws:

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        The state of the settlement including information about connected roads return us string result depends if we have roads connected to the city or not
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        The data in the settlement object.
